The '''Madagascar Jacana''' ('''''Actophilornis albinucha''''') is a species of [[bird]] in the [[Jacanidae]] family.
It is [[Endemism|endemic]] to [[Madagascar]].

==References==
* BirdLife International 2004.  [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/49099/all Actophilornis albinucha].   [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ]  Downloaded on 28 July 2007.
